section.p: The Cognitive Abilities Observation represents a patient's ability to perform specific cognitive tasks (e.g., ability to plan, logical sequencing ability, ability to think abstractly).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:29248, CONF:29249 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.126"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:29246)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:29247)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:29250)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Cognitive Abilities Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.48 DYNAMIC (CONF:29251)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:29252)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:29256)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:29257)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:29258)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Mental and Functional Status Response 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.44 DYNAMIC (CONF:29264)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:31923)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:29266, CONF:29267, CONF:29268)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:29246)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:29247)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:29250)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Cognitive Abilities Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.48 DYNAMIC (CONF:29251)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:29252)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:29256)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:29257)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:29258)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Mental and Functional Status Response 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.44 DYNAMIC (CONF:29264)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:31923)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:29266, CONF:29267, CONF:29268)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.126"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.126"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1984681219"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1434575221"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="422154286"/> <code code="931848257"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1735393517"/> <code code="1994266606"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <author/> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.86"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="375310444"/> <code code="280146228"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <referenceRange> <observationRange/> </referenceRange> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
